a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The female labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population aged 15 and
older that is economically active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see
limitations and exceptions in the Sources tab).
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 2020 (% of female population ages 15+ national estimate)
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 1980 (% of female population ages 15+ national estimate)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
